channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA

item.title: 🟢 15:39 Return the threat of artebors to Pokrovskaya territorial community.Creck on further reports.
item.description: 🟢 15:39 Return the threat of artebors to Pokrovskaya territorial community.Creck on further reports. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
